FulfillmentTaskAssignmentRule.name: FulfillmentTaskAssignmentRule
FulfillmentTaskAssignmentRule.description: Represents a set of actions that assign a task to a user or queue.

ConditionId.description: Condition ID that's used to determine the task assignment.

DestinationId.description: Destination ID of the task assignment such as, Queue or User.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date when a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date when a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the object that specifies the condition used to determine the task assignment.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who created the task assignment rule record.

Priority.description: The priority of the rule for execution.

SourceId.description: Source ID of the task assignment such as, Queue or Fulfillment Step Definition.

TaskAllocationType.description: The method of assigning the manual step.
